name: Coloring Soap Naturally - eBook
description:
Want to use natural ingredients to color your cold process soap but don't know where to start? Have you had disappointing results with some ingredients that turned out ...well... not how you expected? "Coloring Soap Naturally" takes the guesswork out of coloring your cold process soap with natural ingredients. I've gone through the "trial-and-error" part for you. And put together all the results in one eBook filled with information and photos! This 51-page PDF digital book includes: •Results of the 34 different natural ingredients that were tested •Full-color photographs of all the results •How the colorant looks when added at trace, in the lye and as an oil infusion •The difference in color between each soap when it went through a gel phase and when it didn't •Clear descriptions of all the procedures used to do the testing (so you can do it, too!) •List of suppliers of all the ingredients used

You can have bright, beautiful soap colored naturally! Coloring Soap Naturally can show you how. After purchasing this PDF-format digital book, you will receive an email right away with a link that lets you download the book directly to your computer. Because there's no time to waste when there's beautiful soap to be made! Click here and see the FAQ page for this book with more details and descriptions!

name: Cold Process Milk Soap - eClass
description: Discover the creamy world of milk soaps! When used in place of distilled water, milk is a lovely addition to cold process soap. Many folks consider milk soaps to be milder, more conditioning, and have a creamier lather. But using milk in cold process soap takes a bit more care. Although they are mostly water, milks also contain proteins, sugars and fats. These components bring beneficial qualities to soap, but they can also make soapmaking a little trickier. Fear not! "Cold Process Milk Soap" will take the mystery out of making beautiful milk soaps. This 9-page PDF eClass includes: • a thorough description of which milks and milk products are good additions to soap, including fresh milk, canned milk and powdered milk • complete recipes for three batches of soap made with goat milk, coconut milk & soy milk (just like the soaps made in class-see below) • step-by-step instructions with photos • a list of resources for ingredients and supplies When all is said and done, you'll have the knowledge and confidence you need to make your own creamy milk soaps. This is the digital PDF version of the handout for the class given by Ruth Esteves at The Nova Studio in Point Richmond, CA. While the handout by itself can never take the place of sitting in on a live class, it is definitely written to stand alone. And it will give you all the information you need to learn the topic thoroughly. It's the next best thing to being in class! After purchasing, you will receive an email with a link where you can download your handout right away.

name: Making Cold Process Soap with Alternative Liquids - eClass
description: Getting bored with your cold process soap? Juice it up! Dump the boring distilled water and get turned onto a variety of interesting liquids that can be used to make soap: coffee, tea, juices, beer & wine! Each one can bring something fun and exciting to your handmade soap! Of course, you always need some kind of liquid to dissolve the sodium hydroxide before making cold process soap, but it doesn’t have to be water. Alternative liquids can bring new (natural) colors, scents and unique qualities to your soap that water just can’t. This 9-page eClass handout includes: • tips on making cold process soap with alcoholic beverages, coffee and teas and juices • 3 recipes for soap made with beer, coffee and vegetable juice (just like the soaps made in class-see below) • step-by-step instructions with photos • a list of resources for ingredients and supplies Explore the wide variety of alternative liquid options available in your soapmaking and take your soap to the next level! This is the digital PDF version of the handout for the class given by Ruth Esteves at The Nova Studio in Point Richmond, CA. This is also the basis of the talk given by Ruth at the Handcrafted Soapmakers Guild Annual Conference in 2012. While the handout by itself can never take the place of sitting in on a live class, it is definitely written to stand alone. And it will give you all the information you need to learn the topic thoroughly. It's the next best thing to being in class! After purchasing, you will receive an email with a link where you can download your handout right away.

name: Morning Mojito
description: Inspired by the Cuban cocktail, this essential oil blend of lime and spearmint is a tangy refresher. Like a cool drink on a tropical afternoon, this one is crisp and invigorating. Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, essential oils of lime, spearmint and litsea cubeba, rosemary oleoresin extract, parsley A phthalate free soap Net wt. 4oz/113g Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Blue Velvet
description: Can a soap smell like falling in love? Blue Velvet comes close. The first whiff is exciting and fresh and new, a blend of sunny lemon and rosemary. But underneath lies the sultry base of sandalwood, vetyver and musk, a lingering aroma that keeps you coming back for more. Blue Velvet is a sexy, smoldering soap, not for the shy and retiring. This classy scent called for this simple, classy, pin-stripe design. The beautiful blue color is still masculine enough for him. The perfect look for this unisex fragrance. Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, fragrance, rosemary oleoresin extract, ultramarine blue, titanium dioxide, mica, iron oxide A phthalate free soap Net wt. 4oz/113g Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Fruitopia
description:
Fresh, fruity, colorful... it's just fun!

It could be said that Fruitopia has something for everyone. The bright berry/grapefruit/lime notes are the first thing to tickle your nose. But under that is just a touch of a lovely floral reminiscent of jasmine and orange blossom. And in the end, a soft musky-fruity note rounds out this blend. 

Grab a bar and have a party in your shower! Who else you invite is up to you! (wink, wink)

Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, fragrance, rosemary oleoresin extract, mica, titanium dioxide, tin dioxide, iron oxide

Net wt. 4oz/113g

Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Raspberry Cream
description: Like a bowl of sun-ripened berries swimming in a pool of vanilla cream, this yummy scent will have you wishing you could eat soap! (But we really don't recommend it.) Sweet with a delicate floral note, this handmade soap is perfect for anyone who likes creamy, fruity scents. Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, fragrance, rosemary oleoresin extract, mica, titanium dioxide, tin dioxide, iron oxide A phthalate free soap Net wt. 4oz/113g Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Provence
description: Lavender and rosemary - a classic combination that smells like a warm summer field in the south of France. Natural essential oils bring Provence to your shower! Herbal green and lavender swirl together throughout this handmade soap, a colorful visual blending of these two lovely scents. Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, rosemary and lavender essential oils, ultramarine, titanium dioxide, chrome green oxide A phthalate free soap Net wt. 4oz/113g Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Smoky Sandalwood
description:
Not your plain-Jane sandalwood, this soap has the most alluring, sexy scent you will ever smell. A great choice for men (and daring women), this soap brings a woody, lush and sensual quality to your day that will linger long after your morning shower.

A scent as dreamy as this inspired us to design this dreamy, swirly bar using warm browns and dark reds. Like a beautifully patterned wood, each bar is unique.

Ingredients: olive oil, water, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, fragrance, rosemary oleoresin extract, iron oxide

Net wt. 4oz/113g

Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Honeycomb
description: This soap has no added fragrance, but we can’t resist sniffing it! The natural aroma of fresh goat milk and clover honey really comes through in this gentle bar. Even the warm, tan color is a natural result of the soapmaking process. For those looking for a simple, mild soap, our Honeycomb certainly delivers with a light, yummy scent and creamy lather. We didn't put any bees to work in making this honeycomb design, but it is certainly a good impression! Ingredients: olive oil, goat milk, coconut oil, sustainably grown palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, rosemary oleoresin extract, honey A phthalate free soap Net wt. 4oz/113g Sirona Springs soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand.

name: Soap & Wood Soap Dish
description:
The perfect pairing of luxury and practicality: our Soap & Wood Soap Dish gift set includes one bar of Sirona Springs handmade soap of your choice along and a wooden soap dish, wrapped and ready to give away!

The best place to keep your handmade soap between uses is on a soap dish that drains water, like this beautiful curved soap dish made of solid beech wood. The elegant, sloped profile will dress up any kitchen or bathroom sink. The wood dish measures 3inches by 4.5inches by .75inches.

We have done the hard work for you by packaging this set in a shimmery, sheer organza bag with satin ribbons and a gift tag attached. It makes an easy and thoughtful gift for clients, teachers, friends: anyone who deserves a little luxury.

Please mention in the Comments section at checkout your choice of soap. Color of the organza bag may differ from the one shown.

name: Soap & Cotton Soap Bag
description:
Looking for a handy gift that is sure to fit anyone? Our Soap and Cotton Soap Bag gift set includes a bar of Sirona Springs handmade soap of your choice plus a soap bag, all wrapped up and ready to give away!

Made of natural cotton with a handy drawstring, this soap bag measures 5inches by 4.25inches. Large enough to hold an entire bar of soap, it is especially handy for saving all of those little slivers of soap that you don't want to lose down the drain! 

Just pop the soap into this bag and gently exfoliate your body as the soap is worked into a creamy lather. Hang up to dry when you are done. Easy!

We have done the hard work for you by packaging this set in a shimmery, sheer organza bag with satin ribbons and a gift tag attached. It makes an easy and thoughtful gift for clients, teachers, friends: anyone who deserves a little luxury.

Please mention in the Comments section at checkout your choice of soap. Color of the organza bag may differ from the one shown.
